name: Nom
Add any other stats not included above: Ajoutez les stats non incluses au dessus
Loading gear automatically from the game: Charge automatiquement l'équipement provenant du jeu
1. Install requirements from the <a href:
1. Install requirements from the instructions on Github
2. Leave your emulator open, and close Epic 7
3. Click the Start scanning button below
4. Open Epic 7, and load into the lobby
5. Click the Stop scanning button below
6. Wait up to 30 secs, then once the data appears, click Export to save it to a 'gear.txt'
7. Import the 'gear.txt' with the Merge option
8. If the message tells you to, use the Level = 0 filter to manually fix any level 0 items on the Gear tab
Use merge to update all your gear after: Use merge to update all your gear after using the scanner or screenshot tool.
Use add only if you're using screenshots: Use add only if you're using screenshots and want to update a small number of gears.
You can load/save your hero + gear confi: Vous pouvez charger/sauvegarder votre héros et son équipement ici.
Creating gear data from screenshots: Crée les données provenant des captures d'écran
Hit 'Choose Folder', navigate into the f: Hit 'Choose Folder', navigate into the folder where your screenshots are located, then hit 'Submit'. (The folder should show as empty, just select it)
Once results are printed, hit 'Export'. This will output a 'gear.txt' in the folder where you installed this app.
Import gear from Zarroc optimizer: Importer des données de l'optimisateur Zarroc
Automatically unlock equipment after une: Automatiquement déverrouiller les équipements après le déséquipement
Use rage set bonus for damage optimizati: Prendre en compte le set <b>Rage<b> dans le calcul des dégâts
Select default folder: Choisir le dossier de sauvegarde par défaut
Choose the desired main stats for access: Choose the desired main stats for accessories. Multiple options can be selected per slot.
Choose the desired gear sets. Multiple o: Choose the desired gear sets. Multiple options can be selected per slot. The first slot must be either only 4 piece or 2 piece sets.
Choose any sets you don't want included: Choose any sets you don't want included in the search.
Select substat filters to filter results: Select substat filters to filter results by. Left column is min (inclusive) and right column is max (inclusive).
Select rating filters to filter results: Select rating filters to filter results by. Ratings are stats that aren't seen in the game, but are useful for comparing builds.  Left column is min (inclusive) and right column is max (inclusive).
<b>Cp - </b> Combat power, as you would: Cp - Combat power, as you would find it ingame, but without factoring in skill enhances. Useful for workd boss units.
<b>HpS - </b> Hp * Speed rating, for com: HpS - Hp * Speed rating, for comparing fast/health builds, disregaring defense. Example health scaling units: Krau, Fceci.
<b>Ehp - </b> Effective Hp, for comparin: Ehp - Effective Hp, for comparing how much damage a unit can take. Formula: HP * (Defense/300 + 1).
<b>EhpS - </b> Effective Hp * Speed rati: EhpS - Effective Hp * Speed rating, for comparing fast/tanky builds.
<b>Dmg - </b> Average damage rating, mea: Dmg - Average damage rating, measures how much damage your unit will deal on average, factoring in crit chance & damage.
<b>DmgS - </b> Average damage * Speed ra: DmgS - Average damage * Speed rating, measures average damage vs speed.
<b>Mcd - </b> Max crit damage rating, me: Mcd - Max crit damage rating, measures damage at 100% crit chance. Example units: Arby, JKise.
<b>McdS - </b> Max crit damage * Speed r: McdS - Max crit damage * Speed rating, measures damage at 100% crit chance vs speed.
<b>DmgH - </b> Dmg * Hp rating, average: DmgH - Dmg * Hp rating, average damage rating, scaled by your units health. Useful for HP scaling bruisers.
<b>Upg - </b> Number items to upgrade -: Upg - Number items to upgrade - including reforges and enhances.
<b>Score - </b> Sum of gear score of all: Score - Sum of gear score of all 6 pieces.
<b>This is the most useful filter but pl: This is the most useful filter but please read before using it. Using this wrong can exclude good results from the search.
Assign a priority to each substat type f: Assign a priority to each substat type from -1 to 3. This will go through every gear, and calculates the # of max rolls of each stat. The # of rolls is then multiplied by the stat priority you chose. It adds up all the stat scores for a gear, and sorts your gear by their highest substat score.
After that, it chooses only the Top X% o: After that, it chooses only the Top X% of scored gears to use for the search.For example, if you select Atk: 3 / Cr: 3 / Cd: 3 / Top 40%, this will use only the best 40% of your gears sorted by Atk / Cr / Cd substats.
This filter does nothing when Top X% is: This filter does nothing when Top X% is 100. I find 40-50% to be a good range to start with, and adjust the Top X% lower/higher based on your own gear and the results you get. Lowering the percent narrows down your best gears to make the search faster, but going too low will exclude possible good builds and will be less optimal.
This works best when accessory stats and: This works best when accessory stats and set options are selected.
Select the hero you want to optimize.
<b>Start - </b> Start a search using the: Start - Start a search using the current settings.
<b>Filter - </b> Keep the current optimi: Filter - Keep the current optimization results, but re-apply the stat and rating filters. Useful for narrowing down a search.
<b>Cancel - </b> Attempts to cancel an o: Cancel - Attempts to cancel an ongoing search. This won't always cancel immediately, if the process is busy.
<b>Reset filters - </b> Resets all optim: Reset filters - Resets all optimization filters to their default values.
The left shows your unit's current stats: The left shows your unit's current stats. The middle shows the stats after the stat change. Right side shows the difference.
<b>Use reforged stats - </b> Predict the: Use reforged stats - Predict the reforged stats on +15 level 85 gear to use in the search. Warning: the substat prediction is not always accurate.
<b>Only maxed gear - </b> Search only fo: Only maxed gear - Search only for builds that contain all +15 and reforged gear.
<b>Locked items - </b> Allow locked item: Locked items - Allow locked items in the search.
<b>Equipped items - </b> Allow items equ: Equipped items - Allow items equipped by other heroes in the search.
<b>Keep current - </b> Keep any existing: Keep current - Keep any existing gears on the unit, and search only for the missing gear pieces.
<b>Exclude equipped - </b> Ignores the d: Exclude equipped - Ignores the dropdown selected units' currently equipped gear in optimization. Only works when 'Equipped items' is checked.
Shows how many pieces of gear will be us: Shows how many pieces of gear will be used in the search, after filters are applied.
If you notice for example, you only have: If you notice for example, you only have 2 rings being used, try expanding your filters to use more ring options. Or if you see too much gear being used, reduce your Top % filter to be more selective.
<b>Permutations - </b> Number of permuta: Permutations - Number of permutations of the filtered gear that need to be searched. Make this number lower to make searches faster, but you will be searching less options.
<b>Results - </b> Number of search resul: Results - Number of search results that satisfy the stat filters. There is a maximum of 5,000,000 results before the search stops (for memory limitations).
<b>Equip/Unequip Items - </b> Equips/Une: Equip/Unequip Items - Equips/Unequip the current selected gears onto your hero. Automatically saves the build.
<b>Lock/Unlock Items - </b> Locks/Unlock: Lock/Unlock Items - Locks/Unlocks the current selected gears that you want to be excluded from other searches.
<b>Select/Deselect All - </b> Select/Des: Select/Deselect All - Select/Deselects all the items. You can manually check/uncheck each checkbox as well.
<b>Save/Remove Build - </b> Saves/Remove: Save/Remove Build - Saves/Removes the currently selected row as a build. This will mark it with a star, and the build will be visible on the Heroes tab.
View and edit gears here. Multiple gears: View and edit gears here. Multiple gears can be selected with Ctrl + click or Shift + click. The number of selected gear can be found in the top right corner.
Score - Gear score. This score measures: Score - Gear score. This score measures how well your gear rolled, scaled by the max roll for 85 gear (assuming 4 for speed). Similar to WSS, except flat stats rolls are included. Flat stats account to percentage equivalent was determined using the average stats of 5* units divided by the average flat roll. By this metric, a single flat roll corresponds to ~3.5 Atk %, ~5.0 Def %, ~3.1 Hp %.
dScore - DPS Score. This is the Score fo: dScore - DPS Score. This is the Score formula but only counting Attack/%, Crit Chance, Crit Damage, and Speed.
sScore - Support Score. This is the Scor: sScore - Support Score. This is the Score formula but only counting Hp/%, Defense/%, Effect Resist, and Speed.
cScore - Combat Score. This is the Score: cScore - Combat Score. This is the Score formula excluding Effectiveness and Effect Resist.
Edit Selected Item - Change an items sta: Edit Selected Item - Change an items stats, levels, or equip it onto someone.
Reforge Item - Only works on +15 level 8: Reforge Item - Only works on +15 level 85 gears, predicts the item's reforged stats and generates the edited version.
Add New Item - Create a new item and fil: Add New Item - Create a new item and fill in its stats.
Duplicate Item - Create a copy of the se: Duplicate Item - Create a copy of the selected item and lets you change its stats.
Remove Items - Unequips and then deletes: Remove Items - Unequips and then deletes the items. Multiple selection enabled.
Unequip Items - Unequips the items from: Unequip Items - Unequips the items from their units. Multiple selection enabled.
Lock/Unlock Items - Locks/Unlocks the it: Lock/Unlock Items - Locks/Unlocks the items that you want to be excluded from searches.
Select filters to filter the gear table: Select filters to filter the gear table by. Only one filter allowed per section for now.
Use the Duplicates filter to find gear w: Use the Duplicates filter to find gear with the same stats, and remove if they were mistakenly added.
Start a search using the current setting: Start a search using the current settings.
No stat priority selected. For best resu: No stat priority selected. For best results, use the stat priority filter.
No sets were selected. For best results,: No sets were selected. For best results, select at least one set.
No accessory main stats were selected. F: No accessory main stats were selected. For best results, use the main stat filter to narrow down the search.
Nothing to export yet, please follow the: Rien à exporter, veuillez suivre les étapes de l'import d'équipement
Hero need a 6 item build before it can b: Un héros requiert un set complet de 6 équip. afin d'être sauvegardé

Failed to start scanning, make sure you: Failed to start scanning, make sure you have Python and pcap installed.
Please make sure Type / Set / Rank / Lev: Please make sure Type / Set / Rank / Level / Enhance / Main stat are not empty
Please make sure +15 items have 4 substa: Please make sure +15 items have 4 substats
Stat priority was selected but the filte: Stat priority was selected but the filter is set to Top 100%. The stat priority filter is only useful when the % is not 100.
Your minimum defense filter is over 10,0: Your minimum defense filter is over 10,000, did you mean HP?
Top % was selected but no stat prioritie: Top % was selected but no stat priorities are assigned. Assign stat priorities otherwise the filter will not work.
Over 5 billion permutations selected. Fo: Over 5 billion permutations selected. For faster results, try applying stricter filters or using a lower Top N%.
Search terminated after the result limit: Search terminated after the result limit was exceeded, the full results are not shown. Please apply more filters to narrow your search.
Invalid sets, the first set filter must: Invalid sets, the first set filter must be either all 4 piece or all 2 piece sets.
Failed to read a screenshot: Error: Coul: Failed to read a screenshot: Error: Could not find MIME for Buffer <null>
Failed to read a screenshot: Could not r: Failed to read a screenshot: Could not read stats from screenshot. Make sure your screenshots are 1600x900, English, and with High Quality Support enabled.
Failed to read a screenshot: Error: Unsu: Failed to read a screenshot: Error: Unsupported MIME type: application/x-rar-compressed
Screenshot reading in progress, please w: Screenshot reading in progress, please wait
Item reading in progress, please wait: Item reading in progress, please wait
Failed to read a screenshot: Error: EISD: Failed to read a screenshot: Error: EISDIR: illegal operation on a directory, read
